english.segment1: Here I Stand Forever In Your Mighty Land. Living With Your Promise Written On My Heart. I Am Yours Surrendered Wholly To You. You Set Me In Your Family. Calling Me Your Own
english.segment2: Chorus: Now I, I Belong To You All I Need. Your Spirit Your Word Your Truth. Hear My Cry My Deep Desire. To Know You More. In Your Name I Will Lift My Hands. To The King This Anthem Of Praise I Bring. Heaven Knows I Long To Love You. With All I Am
